content: KH-EZ CRC Screw anchor Ultimate screw anchor with corrosion-resistant coating (mechanically galvanized carbon steel, hex head) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Time and labor-saving fastening solution especially suited for seismic, cracked concrete and grout filled CMU applications requiring an ICC approval Anchor coating meets ASTM B695 Class 55 for added corrosion resistance Quicker and easier to install than wedge anchors – no cleaning, no high-accuracy torque wrench and no hammering required Optimized thread design for exceptional setting performance, superior load values and reduced edge distances and spacing Fully removable anchoring solution for use with standard ANSI-tolerance drill bits – no special tolerance drill bits required for these screw anchors Applications Structural steel applications where additional corrosion protection is needed Attaching railings, handrails, safety barriers, guard rails and signs Installing storage and rack systems Secondary steel attachment Pressure-treated wood (sill plates) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon Steel, mechanically galvanized Head configuration: Hex head Approvals / Test reports: ICC-ES report (concrete), ICC-ES report (masonry), LABC, Seismic Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon Steel, mechanically galvanized | Head configuration | Hex head | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (concrete), ICC-ES report (masonry), LABC, Seismic | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (lightweight), Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (grout-filled CMU) | Type of fixing | Through-fastening | PROFIS Software | Yes | Environmental conditions | Indoor, damp conditions, Outdoor | IBC compliance | IBC 2018 | Installation direction | All | Material composition | Steel, mechanically galvanized (min. 55 µm) ### ITEMS- 2221943 -
